question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job. Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment. In your letter • describe the problem with the equipment explain how this problem is affecting your work • say what you want the shop or company to do
text: I am writing this letter  regarding an issue which I have with the camera that has your company brand on it and makes a disturbance in my daily work plan as I am a journal photographer. Let me explain more about the matter.

First, I bought this camera 6 months ago with a two-year guarantee from the central branch which is located in a Hyper chain store. Some of the photos that I have taken recently have not been so clear and the contrast of them has been decreasing over the last two weeks. Moreover, this problem contribute to the rejection of my submitted reports to the magazine and none of my photographs has been published recently.

Lastly, seeing that this camera is a vital part of my job consequently, I contacted you to provide me with a solution to fix the camera or replace it with a new one if the guarantee it covers. I look forward to hearing from you.
